website_summaries.verdict: An exceptionally advanced laser tag system if you are willing to stomach the price.
pros: Range and accuracy are top of the line for a consumer-grade laser tag set
cons: Expensive, but you are paying for a very high quality set of laser tag devices

customer_reviews.title: Boys love them but.....
customer_reviews.text: My boys really like playing with these. My husband and myself have also played with them with the boys. But one of the guns stopped working. Update: customer service is great. I told them that one of the guns quit working and all I had to do was send them the gun that stopped working and they sent me a replacement. Guns still work great. Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: EdeeSmith02

customer_reviews.title: BEST LASERTAG SET I EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of laser tag gun sets in my time and these are by far my favorite. This set is light weight but also very good quality. I’ve bought a set twice, because they are so awesome and my first set was stolen. Totally worth the price and hours of fun. Easy to understand and learn and you don’t have to count down and sync. They sync automatically once they are powered on. You choose teams by what color you choose to set the gun at. You have a awesome selection of weapons. If you like laser tag, search No more! This is the ideal set.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - FALSE ADVERTISING!!!
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING!!!! The gun/case in the first picture featured above are NOT what you get when you order this. You get the guns in the 3rd picture, which are much poorer quality than the ones in the first picture. I bought this to expand my sons’ set (we already have four of the ones pictured in the first photo - which are great) so they could play with more friends. What we received was not compatible at all and barely worked. Returned and sleepover near ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pepper

customer_reviews.title: I hate this Chinese QC game...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set about 18 months ago and it was the highest rated one on Amazon. They worked surprisingly well and the kids loved them. I purchased this matching set to go along with the first set for my son's birthday party. Of the 4 guns: - Blue gun: Sensor on the one didn't work so you couldn't hit him from the side of the gun. - Red gun: The one laser wouldn't register on other guns. - White gun: Would shut off randomly. Why China, why?!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: worked for a day
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 4 packs of these guns. We bought the batteries and fired them up. They worked for 4 rounds and then the blue gun will not work. It turns on and the first shot the lives light starts flashing, when no-one has shot at it. Very frustrating for an 8 year old. We love the game and have 2 sets but if they are only going to work 4 rounds it isn't very fun. No on wants the gun that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Richards

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal(non rechargeable)
customer_reviews.text: These went over great with the kids. I would suggest paying the extra for rechargeable if you plan on using them a lot because you will be replacing batteries frequently. That being said they weren’t a bad deal at all and we have had them for six months and have used a good handful of times. With new batteries the life will last for quite a few hours
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVED these
customer_reviews.text: Ton's of fun. I also ordered 2 of the "bug" practice targets. Man do we have fun with these. Great guns, good quality, and i highly recommend getting some of the target bugs! The nice thing also for the kids is no vest's or helmets to wear. Everything is contained in the gun so it's quick startup to play and when they are done it's quick easy back in the box clean up. Highly recommend. My son is 6 and has no issues knowing how to use this and once I explained the different "gun" modes he is able to switch modes also.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Hetzel

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son's birthday 3 years ago. I bought another set so we could have more teams. The only thing you need to have is batteries. I did get recharables. I really like that you don't need a vest and they light up. My husband and I play with the boys. We stack boxes as barriers in the back yard. The boys take them to the park. They are best I think at night but you can play during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality product. The blue gun battery compartment was stripped and would not open to allow battery placement. The working guns seem okay but are also flimsy and do not seem like they will hold up well. The distance to shoot these weapons is weak and you do not have much freedom to truly play laser tag from any sort of distance. I contacted the company on June 22, 2018, but they have still NEVER replied. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mutnick

customer_reviews.title: 3 of 4 guns failed. Quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these guns for a couple of years now and I can report that 3 of the 4 guns stopped working. My kids have no idea that they are lazer tag guns and just make shooting noises wen playing with them because they are nothing more than props now.
customer_reviews.author: RadPro

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk and bought 12 of these laser tag guns for my kids and their friends to use on our farm. Well, fast forward 8 months or more and the guns work perfectly. Our kids absolutely love them. Nothing better than looking out the kitchen window and seeing your kids running around the yard with their friends and all of them are sweating, smiling and just plain having fun.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: These guns are fantastic and far better then anything I used to use
customer_reviews.text: Laser tag has comoe along way. These guns are fantastic and far better then anything I used to use. The guns themselves are what shoot of course, but they also are the target and score keepers. A great perk is that you can change the weapon system of the gun, meaning you can switch it to a shotgun, rocket launcher, or subgun. Each weapon system has its pros and cons. One slight drawback is that the range seems diminished in daylight, so these work best at night or indoors
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: JML
customer_reviews.text: Was excited and opened to check them out. Purchased for grandsons birthday the first of the year. When I picked up one of the lazer guns it was wet as if rained on. They all had moisture on them. The package was wrapped in plastic so not sure how this occured. I plan to put batteries in them to make sure they work. My concern is corrosion in the battery compartment. Will update when I get a chance to try without kids around.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Not really any volume control, they're quite loud but these aren't really designed so much to be an indoor toy anyway so I didn't deduct over all for that. Great product, excellent value that is compatible with pretty much every other manufacturer out there so tough to go wrong here. I was originally torn between my kids desire for nerf toys and getting them laser tag, but having to replace batteries vs replacing darts ultimately won out (plus the triggers on nerf guns can be a little tough for my 4yr old).
customer_reviews.author: Greg DiDieu

customer_reviews.title: Started breaking down after the first day
customer_reviews.text: They're great toys and a ton of fun to play with, but the set we got started having problems after a few hours of play. The team indicator lights started failing first. You could get one or two teams to work on a particular gun. Then one just stopped working. I tried swapping out the batteries, but that didn't help. I returned my first set and ordered a second, hoping for better luck. Edit: second set is working perfectly - lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: D. Mitchard

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I feel we over paid for the set since you can get a 2 pack for roughly $100 bucks now, but it was well worth it. I love playing laser tag with the kids in the house. We have been having a blast with them since Christmas. We have not been able to test the distance they can tag, but we will do that soon and I will update with the results. My 1 yo loves to run around and pull the trigger and act like he is playing tag with us. It may be he just likes the lights and noises. I cannot wait to get outside with these once it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: UnderCover_LPR

customer_reviews.title: The whole neighborhood loves them!
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE these. They are a hit for the whole neighborhood of kids, actually. Someone ALWAYS wants to play with them. They only lose a star because this set uses 16 batteries (4 AA per gun), and they positively EAT batteries. Rechargeables are a must, but at around ten dollars for 4 rechargeable AAs, that's still forty in dedicated batteries. Yeowch.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but short range and not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two four-packs. We had fun with them, but they have a pretty short range (I'd say about 50 to 60 feet), and two of the eight don't work very well. They don't register hits well, and they don't shoot well (the other guns don't sense getting hit. Also, the batteries are very difficult to change, and the batteries don't last as long as they should. We bought the robot bug, which was fun to use and did help the kids learn how to aim, but the bug broke after using it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Joal D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and way better than they Laser X guns that sell at Target. Love that it’s just a gun without any extra pack to wear. We have several sets of these and they all work together. We have received these as a gift and also given them. They are a hit every time!
customer_reviews.author: KCunningham

customer_reviews.title: Best Laser Tag Set!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the coolest laser tag set we have ever owned! Well worth the money and we are considering purchasing another set! On one of our guns when your choosing what color team your going to be on, the light just shows up as white, when it's really supposed to be green. But not a deal breaker for us.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Gubler

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not as fun as other laser tag guns
customer_reviews.text: I have both this set and the Hasbro Nerf Lazer Tag Phoenix LTX. I bought this set after already having the Nerf lazer tag guns. In my opinion the Legacy laser tag set is no where near as fun as the Hasbro Nerf laser tag guns. Also, the Hasbro guns seem to be more accurate and they just seem to work better and they seem to be better quality. The only thing I liked about these guns is the case they came in, I would definitely not purchase these guns again.
customer_reviews.author: Craigg

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy - inoperable
customer_reviews.text: The batteries do not make a connection within the product for it to even function. All that is heard is rattling. Terribly disappointed. I wish I had given as a gift within the return window to have some sort of recourse. Ordered in Oct and given as Christmas gift. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: So far great product.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these as a birthday gift and opened them up to try them today. Despite saying they would come in Aug 3, they were here more than a week earlier which was perfect timing! So far... They are pretty heavy duty plastic. I can see them holding up even with my little one abusing them. Easy to use, even for a four year old. You can create teams (my little one likes to be on Daddy's team against everyone else.) Keeps track of your life on the gun. They rumble when you shoot and have four types of 'gun' modes with varying amounts of damage and reload times. Over all, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten T Franklin

customer_reviews.title: One of the guns does not work!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy! Super fun. However, we just tried the 4th gun of the box yesterday and it didn't work. The other 3 were fine. On the 4th gun, the level doesn't change when it gets shot by another gun. Just spent a half an hour on the internet looking for manufacturer website information and found nothing. I will return them if I cannot solve the problem. Update: I am returning them. Was unable to find any kind of customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Anik

customer_reviews.title: screws stripped on battery compartment
customer_reviews.text: bought these for our son's 2 boys so they could all play together. right out of the box, we were unable to put batteries in one of the guns because the battery compartment screw heads were stripped. it called for Phillips head but nothing would work. The other guns worked well when batteries were inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: some guns work, some not so much
customer_reviews.text: one out of four guns didn't work at all, and another one glitches and has to be turned of and on a couple times before it works, but for the remaining 2, the kids have a blast using them! Maybe my experience is the exception, but I wouldn't plan on all guns working. But still an okay purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I, and their friends have played with these many times and have had a blast! I bought 12 guns and although 1 didn't work, the rest did and the kids love them. I'm writing a review now because I'm going to purchase another case of these. Buy them and have a blast with your kids or grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin1772

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after one year
customer_reviews.text: We got these a year ago and they are still working great after much use and abuse by lots of kids in the neighborhood. We did the enloop batteries because I thought they would need recharged alot but have been surprised how long they last. These have been a great buy and they are even cheaper now than when we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun set of laser guns. They work great! I haven't had a problem with them at all. I've had them for well over a month and they still work great! Best part is, is that I haven't had to change the batteries in them yet either. 4 guns, 4 gun settings, (pistol, shotgun, machine gun, and missle launcher) each one does a different damage. I recommend these to anyone wanting a fun laser tag experience. Oh, and it expandable to unlimited players divided into 4 teams (blue, red, green, white). Meaning you could have 1,000 players or more (if you had that many laser guns) and it would still work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Okay Except One Gun Won't Open to Put Batteries Into
customer_reviews.text: My boys have loved these EXCEPT... we can't get the battery cover off of one of the guns so it's useless. Also, the sensors aren't the best. Sometimes they are firing right at the other gun and it still doesn't detect. The kids enjoy it thought, just wish we could get a 4th gun that works!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good, we've had them for a while and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good, we've had them for a while and haven't replaced the batteries once (using Eneloops) and the kids have a great deal of fun with them. They are IR, not laser and it's really hard to tell at times how to master firing but none the less no complaints from the kids. There's a video review floating around which I highly recommend to learn some of the details as there are a few settings to get familiar with.
customer_reviews.author: bjm

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them. I like that 4 come with the package and they work well. Would buy again and they seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Aime A.

customer_reviews.title: First time review
customer_reviews.text: First- we love the guns. They are easy to use, and the easy team settings make this a ton of fun. They are exactly what we hoped for. I was prompted to write a review by my experiences with customer service. One of the guns had some light settings that didn't work. You could still play with it, but team options were limited. I emailed the seller, and within the hour they were asking for my preferred shipping address to send me new guns. This is the way you hope companies will respond when you have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Foltz

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. They are on the louder side. But they love shutting all the curtains in the house and all the lights off and going full stealth mode to play. Occassionally they take them outside as well. They have had them since August 2018 and they still work great with no change in batteries. The storage box they come in has held up great also.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra S.

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for one day - No response when I contacted seller - still trying to return
customer_reviews.text: These guns are awesome and so is the customer service. The green one stopped working on the second day, and the company sent two new free blasters. It started to flicker when you turned it on and off and then wouldn't come on at all anymore. I sent the company an email and asked to exchange the green one and got a quick reply. We spent all of Christmas day in the yard playing with these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our teenage kids (and us) to play laser tag/capture the flag on our 5 acres of land. The different gun modes are great and a nice additon to the basic laser tag guns with their single mode. We had so much fun and the kids will use these for epic battles with their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Lots of positives from these. They in no way could be mistaken for real weapons, so that's a plus when kids are playing with them in the park. They aren't too loud, but are loud enough to add some excitement-- different sounds depending on the setting. Gets the kids out of the house and off the tablet. Neighbors come over and want to play. Son gets me out to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... see the green gun and my husband says “He’ll love that one
customer_reviews.text: We had the best Christmas playing laser tag. Although we were disappointed at first because we had minor problem with one of the guns, the company responded immediately with a replacement gun. The gun noises are fun to play with. You can use 4 different sound modes. I found that looking up the guns on you tube was quite helpful in getting the most out of your game play. Highly recommend. So much FUN!
customer_reviews.author: LQ

customer_reviews.title: and they felt comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my 3 nephews for Christmas, and they were an instant hit. The guns aren't cheaply made, and they felt comfortable to hold. They come in great re-usable packaging. The mechanics of the laser tag system are easy enough to learn for my 5 year old nephew, yet engaging enough for his 12 year old brother to enjoy. We had lots of fun playing with the different weapon settings - pistol, shotgun, semi-automatic, and rocket launcher. This was an excellent purchase, and I hope the boys enjoy them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I purchased them for my grandson (11) and he had a great time with them this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I don't often give 5 stars because I honestly don't "love" everything I buy. I purchased these for my grandson (11) and he had a great time with them this Christmas. His cousins are 22 and older but he had plenty of people who wanted to play laser tag on Christmas Day - cousins, parents, aunts, uncles, grandparents and even a great grand parent all took their turns so that the adults finally wore him out.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: but the guns are awesome. When you get hit
customer_reviews.text: These laser guns are legit! Each takes 4 batteries and I don't yet know how long the batteries will last, but the guns are awesome. When you get hit, your gun vibrates and makes a noise. When you're almost out of lives, it makes a loud buzz so everyone knows that you're almost out. My boys (age 7 and 9) are currently Nerf-fanatics, and I'm tired of Nerf bullets all over my house. This gives the boys the same type of play as the Nerf guns without the mess!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that this item was not at all as expected. Only 2 of the weapons worked. The instructions stated 4 AAA’s where it was clear you needed 4 AA’s. Costly but ineffective. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nickles

customer_reviews.title: ... price reduction alone should tell you that they are garbage. Lasted a couple weeks before the one gun ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these less than 1 year and the price reduction alone should tell you that they are garbage. Lasted a couple weeks before the one gun began glitching. Now there are 2 guns left and the one only works if you keep it held upside down.
customer_reviews.author: nlbauman

customer_reviews.title: One gun does not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: My product came today, but one of the guns does not turn on. I changed the batteries a second time with new ones but it still will not turn on. The other three guns seem to work fine. Also the description says they take AA batteries, but they really take AAA instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stotenbur

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, work great!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I was at first a bit skeptical of the price of these guns, so far I am happy. Very nicely packaged in a quality storage case, the guns appear heavy duty, and all work very well. The sounds get a bit tiring after hours of constant laser tag play, but I am glad the kids are having fun with them. No problems at all, and am happily surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laser tag
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE. I gave it 4 stars because one gun does not work properly. Seems like an issue with the ON button but the kids have been playing laser tag all over the house! Cannot wait for summer so they can run around outside.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't rave enough about how much fun these are
customer_reviews.text: Can't rave enough about how much fun these are, for grown-ups and kids. Very well-made as well. I was really afraid that these would not work well, but the sensors are all sensitive and accurate. Fun for use in the house and outside. My kids, age 9-13 all have had a blast with these and figured out how to change guns etc. very quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky140

customer_reviews.title: returned it because 2 of four guns did not work
customer_reviews.text: These guns looked great and the ones that worked were really fun but we returned them because we could not get two of the guns to work. Also, poor quality screws make it very difficult to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: got the guns. they are not cheap, good quality. work extremely well. hours and hours of fun at night and during the day. one (blue) gun broke after 1 month of use, but the Dynasty support team was awesome to work with - they replaced it within 1 week. So, we're back in action with all of our guns! Great Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Sock up on batteries - a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, for the whole family!! There's an on/off switch and a reload button on the bottom of the handle. There's an option for "team" color allowing you to play in teams or solo and different firing options. A great addition to our family fun! Great that a guns all you need - no vest or other contraptions.
customer_reviews.author: misskehle

customer_reviews.title: Great to start with but set has not lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: These are great guns for in door laser tag. I purchased them for my 6 year old's birthday and we had a lot of fun with them (inside only) to start with. However, one gun started to have a "god" mode as it just did even seem to get hit - we let that go as the youngest saw that a playing fair! But now another gun doesn't work and its less than a year old. We are not generally hard on toys as I only have one boy and two girls so it really is disappointing. I have had no response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun. FUN. Funnn!!!
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. So. Much. Fun! There are 4 guns.. different color settings (red, blue, etc) and different weapon settings (shotgun, etc). You can play individually.. red vs blue etc or as teams. Teammates cannot shoot one another which is a plus for the wayward shooter! There is a life/health/hit meter that lets you know when you are about to go down. Your gun flashes when you've been hit one too many times and you're out! Play at night! Fun for kids and adults! I am 40 and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adaja

customer_reviews.title: Die after changing batteries.
customer_reviews.text: My kids used these for a bit, and needed a standard battery change. Half did not work once receiving new batteries. It’s a shame, because they were very fun to use when they worked.
customer_reviews.author: bunnybudman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for ages 11 and up!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 boys ages 11 and 14 (two of each) LOVE these!!! They play tag games in the back yard at night all the time. To add these to their game has been great! There is no more touching each other for them to have to complain how hard they got hit or "pushed". They love how they light up and they get to play "live" video games. Mom is happy they are outside getting exercise for so long without even realizing it. Our boys even got my husband and I to play with them. We are TERRIBLE at killing the other people, but it is still a lot of fun even for us.
customer_reviews.author: marksman

customer_reviews.title: One gun never worked
customer_reviews.text: Our family has 4 for of these guns already, so we ordered another set so everyone could play. We were disappointed that they are smaller than our original, but they still seem to work with the bigger ones. These guns also take AAA batteries, not AA like listed in the item description. We started playing and the blue gun would turn on but it wouldn't shoot or change colors...nothing when any buttons were pushed. I'm disappointed in the item not matching the description AND one of them not working.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Barber

customer_reviews.title: Laser Tag a Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets one for my niece and one for my nephew. They absolutely love playing with them in the house during the winter. Gets a bit wild and loud, but they are enjoying them. Can't wait for summer where they can use them at night outside
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...exceeded expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old grandson for Christmas and it was a hit with adults and children alike! Very very high quality, easy to use but NOT a childish toy. Great fun at night with the lights. No need for a vest, you shoot each others guns. I highly recommend for Lazer tag enthusiasts or first timers. Grandma even got in on the fun. :)
customer_reviews.author: LArnold

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a group
customer_reviews.text: These laser guns were very fun for a boy's small party. Adults and kids enjoyed playing with them. I like that you aim to shoot the other guns, no vests or other pieces needed. They have 4 gun modes (rocket launcher, rifle, hand gun and something else), 4 color teams to choose from, and they virbrate/shake when you shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Motek Fourtytwo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and dependable toy for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my Grandchildren and it has been a big hit. These laser tag guns are the perfect way to get the kids away from their game consoles and cell phones, and actually get fresh air and exercise. I highly recommend this set, which has been used quite extensively since Christmas and still working on the batteries that I installed in the guns.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: These guns are a lot of fun! You can switch between four gun modes
customer_reviews.text: These guns are a lot of fun! You can switch between four gun modes, and be on different teams or team up together. The gun vibrates when you are hit and there are lights that function as a health bar to let you know how close you are to loosing. You can play them in the light or in the dark with no nerf bullets to pick up! My 11 year old loves them! We haven't had ours long enough for me to comment on durability or how long the 4 AA batteries last, but our customer service experience was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid's love it both inside and outside the house
customer_reviews.text: Knowing we would be home for a while... it is a great product for the kids. Easy for them to setup and get going. My only disappointment is the green blaster had some poor QC, it was missing an IR shield and had a loose wire near the trigger handle. Besides that the kids love it and can recommend it with some quality issues in mind.
customer_reviews.author: jonviray

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAMILY FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: These guns are so much fun, some of the best fun we've had as a family. We've had friends come and play and even the 4 and 5 yr olds are able to play and learn how to change functions, from what type of gun to reloading to switching teams....such a blast!! And I have to say the way they're packaged in the carrying case that they come in is so nice and so easy to store. Thanks for a great product that has brought our family great fun together!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Best purchase I could have made!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son for his 5th birthday! This has been by far the best purchase ever! Everyone loves playing laser tag with these, including the adults. Definitely recommend purchasing these. So easy to use and several ways to set them up. Super cool!!
customer_reviews.author: S Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone and work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! There are several different types of laser sounds, accuracy is very good even from a distance. You can play teams or individually, and you can even set up your own target shooting practice. My son and his friends love these and so does our whole family we play with them quite a bit and the batteries last a good time as well. Highly recommended and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for boys
customer_reviews.text: They seems really well built. I like how you can choose different teams and guns all on the gun itself and not have to wear that’s dang chest plate. However they are sensitive, I can hit my son even when his sensor is not visible or in my direction. But they are 7 and 5 and don’t care haha
customer_reviews.author: Cory Peters

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is pretty thin and cheap. We popped pieces off by dropping it the day we got it. They snapped back on easily and nothing was cracked. The kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing system. I did exhaustive research for our group ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing system. I did exhaustive research for our group of cousins to play laser tag and these did not disappoint. Literally, all the other Christmas toys sat by the way-side, while these were used for HOURS, by people of all ages. We had a dinner party the other night and all the grown ups joined in and wouldn't give their blasters back to our boys! Everyone asks me where I got them, and they say they plan to get their own. Easy to use (our 7 year old gets newbies up to speed with a 10 second tutorial--he even includes a bit of strategy!). These rock. We bought eight (two sets) and would consider buying more!
customer_reviews.author: twotoeandthreetoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality in question.
customer_reviews.text: This would've been at least 4 stars for the amount of entertainment it provided for my son but we received the product with damage to one of the blasters that made it unusable. The only remedy was to return all four blasters for a refund, which was not at all what my 7 year-old wanted to hear, as he'd received these for his birthday. Luckily, we were able to fix it here and it now works. I would suggest quality control pay closer attention to products being shipped out.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun for kids. And these seem to be holding up well to rough use. When the time comes to replace them, I’d buy this same product again.
customer_reviews.author: celle

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our son. Now the whole family enjoys playing with them! When they first arrived,2 of the guns were not functioning like they should. I sent an email to the company,within a couple hours they responded and within a few days I had 2 new guns. No questions asked and we didn't need to return the other 2. They also sent them in a child's book bag. Added bonus! The game is great fun and worth the money. The company and their customer service are even better!
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome, the adults played with these for hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old for Christmas, but of course of had to open them and try them out. They are awesome, the adults played with these for hours. The packaging is very sleek. These are very easily operated, such a simple button set up. The four different gun options is amazing and I love how you can play four separate players or teams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice little tech twist for at home laser tag
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say we've gotten enough hours of entertainment out of these to justify. Probably played with them 30 hours as a family. They still work and are fun, but like so many toys, life expectancy for entertainment is measured in hours.
customer_reviews.author: rpg007

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend great value and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. The kids have a blast they run around the yards and it is very easy and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China made $15 toys
customer_reviews.text: The screws are stripped to insert the battery’s and they don’t tighten. From the first time loading the battery’s. Came with a cardboard cheap box not exactly a carrying case. And instructions for nothing in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jguzzi922

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These guns are great and work very well BUT why are 2 2 packs cheaper than the 4 pack?
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: I would give this at five because the grandkids loved these guns but one of the guns on off ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this at five because the grandkids loved these guns but one of the guns on off butten did not work well and had to be turned on by adult. As a grandparent I was very embarrassed and now I find out it's not able to be turned on. One grandson can't play. These are great guns Ikids love them
customer_reviews.author: vickihartlep

customer_reviews.title: These are cool but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and the blue gun came broken and two wars later the white one stopped making any sound it was really a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: don't even bother
customer_reviews.text: two of the guns didn't work, it was a hassle trying to get the covers off to put the batteries in. it was one of main to at our family day event but we could not use them. very disappointing .
customer_reviews.author: InnerPeace Hair

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We have had these a year now and have had no issues. I like not having to use a vest and they are a blast as it gets darker outside.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of Christmas 2016!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift award for Christmas this year! Perfect for 8 year olds! The kids played out in the freezing cold and only put the guns down to warm up, eat and then all were back out playing again. Active kids will love these even in the broad daylight. I wasn't sure if they would hold up to dropping and whether the kids would enjoy during the day. Not one complaint!!! All smiles and fun.
customer_reviews.author: leslieb25

customer_reviews.title: We gave the gift to 4 of our grandchildren for ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave the gift to 4 of our grandchildren for Christmas. My son and his 5 year old and my son-in-law and his 6 year old ended up playing with them the most. There were absolutely no problems with it. They figured everything out quite quickly and had a blast playing in the cellar with it. Looking forward to the springtime so they can play outside with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice

customer_reviews.title: ... should buy this if you have an ounce of fun in your body
customer_reviews.text: You should buy this if you have an ounce of fun in your body. I ultimately ended up purchasing two sets. We recently played in the park and were the envy of the other children (and parents - you know you wanted to play). The customer service with this company was high quality. Both sets arrived quickly with easy to understand instructions. Great product! We even loaned them to a co-worker with younger children and now they are hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome time! Beats sitting around the table playing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried these for the first time Christmas Day. Played indoor with my wife and 12 and 6 year old daughters. Awesome time! Beats sitting around the table playing a board game. I will check back in the Spring to see if they are still working. So far, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.. Not reliable.. Two guns did not work
customer_reviews.text: Two of the guns in the set did not work. I gifted to my nephew and it was really embarrassing. Bad quality. I gifted it for his birthday and bought it 4 weeks before his birthday. When we opened it to find that the two guns are not working, it was already late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: One defective. Will not power on.
customer_reviews.text: I like the toys. I purchased for my children's Christmas so I opened them to test all four. I did this after reading the reviews concerning all of the defective guns that were sent to customers. The first three out of the box seem to work well. The fourth will not power on at all. The first thing I noticed about the faulty gun was the batteries I used in the first three barely want to slide in the battery compartment. The slot is physically ALMOST too narrow for the batteries. I hope to get a replacement before Christmas. Other than the defective gun, they seem like they are going to be fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Dear old dad

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find an awesome Lazer tag game, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect but I wasn't disappointed. These are Christmas gifts for the kids but we couldn't help but "try them out". Worked great. Not sure how they'll hold up after being dropped but they seem really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable and gets kids moving!
customer_reviews.text: We have these to our four grandsons. They love them and have played with a group for hours. They love playing outside at night. We are happy for them to have a game they can play with friends that does not involve a computer! Glad they all are enjoying this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for our 8 year old son! This is probably the best overall gift I've bought for any of my 3 kids! Our family plays this at night in the house and we're looking forward to summer to play at night under the stars! Great quality and such a hit!! Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Tied2Cam

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the 4 pack for Christmas and i'm not happy at all none of the guns will work more ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 pack for Christmas and i'm not happy at all none of the guns will work more than 10 feet away and sometimes won't work even closer. I've replaced the batteries more than once and today was the first day we have had them outside of the house. I bought these without any hesitation for the reviews I read...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These guns are really cool. My kids love them and so do their ...
customer_reviews.text: These guns are really cool. My kids love them and so do their friends. The case is really nice too. Not sure how to reset the guns after the game is over so we just turn them off then back on again. I'm going to re-read the directions to see if my husband missed something. Delivery was great too.
customer_reviews.author: J9Z

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My 12- and 14-year-old sons love these laser tag guns. It's such a good value - four guns for a great price. And my boys enjoy the options for each gun (machine gun style, pistol style, shotgun style, and missile launcher style). We had a minor out-of-the-box failure with one gun but Customer Service was prompt and drastically exceeded our expectations with their response. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought 8 of these and when there are a group of kids over, they have a blast with them. My 2 kids didn't use them on their own for long though. Once the novelty wore off, they only come out for larger crowds and only when I think of it myself.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good but hoped for great.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my son's 10th birthday for him to keep and to use at his party. They enjoyed them and will probably play with them again but, the sensor on the gun can be hard to hit when playing at distances outside (and particularly frustrating when kids sort of cheat and cover it with their hands). They prefer to play inside but it's really noisy. Having the sensors on vests instead of on the guns would probably be more fun but, likely much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Colbert Washington

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love having laser tag wars/competitions with the grandkids! So much fun and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer care
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer care. Had an issue with one and immediately resolved my issue! I am a very happy customer and my boys and friends LOVE playing laser tag with them!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Huertas

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not arrived in the original box. Guns precision is totally disappointing. Returned and awaiting the refund...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green laser gun doesn't work :(
customer_reviews.text: My boys were so excited to get these 4 laser guns for their birthdays. I ordered 4 so they could each play with a friend. The green color laser has some kind of short in the on/off switch. It won't work. All new and tested batteries. My boys didn't want them returned because they do really like them and wanted now. But, we are still upset about only having three. Now, have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: GRACE SWEIGART

customer_reviews.title: solid product, kids love to play with it
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that could improve is better indications of the weapons status and battery status.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Aharony

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We all had a blast playing laser tag, ages ranged from 4 to 62. Can't wait for the weather to turn warm and play outside. Guns are easy to use. The battery compartment was a little hard to open the first time. The only thing that would be nice is to have a reset button instead of turning it off and on to start again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun and accurate
customer_reviews.text: these are kick ass!! turn your house into a laser tag arena!
customer_reviews.author: Zacharia L. Shepard

product_meta.title: Dynasty Toys Laser Tag Set for Kids Multiplayer 4 Pack
feature_bullets: With FOUR different Team Settings, you can play on the same team or in a 1v1v1v1 Free-For-All Battle.
Choose between the Blue Team, Red Team, Green Team, or White Team. Plus, the blaster is the target. Meaning you don't need to wear a vest.
Both the TEAM SETTINGS and BLAST SETTINGS are interchangeable on each blaster and can be set on the go.
All 4 blaster settings have different stoppage power, reload times, and range requirements. There is no limit to team sizes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars924 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
